title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen

**Product Description:**

Are you tired of struggling to remove ice and frost from your refrigerator? Our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper is here to make the task easier and more efficient. Made from high-quality stainless steel and durable PP materials, this ice scraper is designed to withstand the rigors of frequent use.

**Key Features:**

* Made from stainless steel and PP materials for durability and ease of use
* Features a comfortable handle and a curved blade for easy scraping of ice and frost
* Suitable for household use and perfect for removing ice and frost from refrigerators and freezers
* Compact design with a length of 17cm and a width of 4.5cm, making it easy to store and maneuver
* Available in three vibrant colors: blue, gray, and pink

**Product Specifications:**

* Material: Stainless Steel and PP
* Size: 17cm (length) x 4.5cm (width)
* Color: Blue, Gray, Pink
* Package Includes: 1 Fridge Ice Scraper
* Measurement Deviation: 1-5mm (please note that measurements may vary slightly due to manufacturing processes)

**Important Notes:**

* Actual color may vary due to monitor and lighting differences. Please refer to our product images for the most accurate representation of the product's color.
* Our product is designed to be durable and long-lasting, but please handle with care to ensure optimal performance.

**Order Now and Get:**

* 1 Fridge Ice Scraper made from high-quality stainless steel and PP materials
* A durable and efficient tool for removing ice and frost from your refrigerator
* A compact and easy-to-store design that makes it perfect for household use

**Return Policy:**

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us within 30 days of delivery to initiate a return or exchange.

**Warranty:**

Our product is backed by a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. If you experience any issues with your product, please contact us within the warranty period to initiate a repair or replacement.

Order now and experience the convenience of easy ice and frost removal with our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper!
